Coming from a poor, working-class background, Helena Kennedy feels particularly strongly about education as it was such a pivotal force in her own life. Learning shouldn't be a commodity. It changed me: I learned about the other, about how the world worked, about art and music. Education will continue to be available to the privileged, but will it be for someone from a background like mine? As the games go on, the moments http://wn.com/Allen_Iverson_44pts_vs_Vince_Carter_T-Mac_Raptors_99/00_NBA Allen Iverson wasn't going to let Vince Carter show him up. Allen Iverson , playing with an injured big toe, scored 44 points, including 30 in the final 19 minutes, as the Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Toronto Raptors 106-93 Wednesday night in a preview of a potential first-round series in the Eastern Conference playoffs. ''When you have that type of quality player come in, you want to step it up, Allen Iverson said. ''When you add to that he's coming into my house, I want to play good in front of my fans.
